channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Insiders say the future of AI will be smaller and cheaper than you think
item.description: Bigger is not necessarily better, these execs say.

item.title: Elon Musk says only AI and robotics can solve the ‘insanely high’ $38 trillion national debt crisis—but it would cause ‘significant deflation’
item.description: After clashing with Trump on spending, Musk argues AI and robotics are the only path to easing record U.S. debt costs—and may even trigger future defl...

item.title: The AI boom is driving valuations sky-high almost overnight. What could go wrong?
item.description: This year, a handful of top AI startups, from Anthropic to Harvey, have raised not just one giant round of funding, but two or more.

item.title: ‘Santa Rally’ stalls even though a December cut from the Fed is a near certainty
item.description: Unfortunately, the tech sector is spoiling the party: Bitcoin sank to $85K early this morning.

item.title: DoorDash CEO Tony Xu outmaneuvered Uber Eats by obsessing over his customer
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: 'Stranger Things' and beyond: Here’s what’s worth streaming in December
U.S. stock futures turn downward after a volatile November
These 5 charts hint at where stocks might go next after a wild November
